mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Trothingham, John B. to Wheat, James S.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Trothingham, John B.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: James S. Wheat, Adjt Gen. Wheeling Sept 2 1861. By Telegraph from Columbus Sept . 1861. State of Virginia General Kelley approves of the arrangement proposed by you & requests me to communicate with you further will the arrangement be new[?] made if I come to Wheeling? Maj. John B. Trothingham 28W104col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Trothingham, John B.
Columbus, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Wheat, James S.
